name: chrome-extension-codeowners
description: Retrieves the code owners to display in gitlab UI over the patterns

scripts.es-build: esbuild --minify --bundle src/*.ts src/**/*.ts  --outdir=./dist && npm run copy-files
scripts.es-build-dev: esbuild src/*.ts src/**/*.ts  --outdir=./dist && npm run copy-files
scripts.es-build-watch: esbuild --minify --bundle  src/*.ts src/**/*.ts  --outdir=./dist --watch && npm run copy-files
